page.title: 06King's Sutton Baptist Church
page.content:
The Baptist Church is not nearly as old as the Parish Church, but it is an attractive stone building in Wales Street. The Minister lives in the village and the Baptists help to run several village activities. There are two Services on Sunday:
10.30am Family Worship & Junior Church A creche is provided and coffee is served after the service. 6.00pm Evening Worship
Each month two of the services include Communion. On Tuesday afternoons ladies from other churches join in an ecumenical meeting. On Thursday evenings there is a Prayer and Bible Study Meeting in someone's house.
